div.div: Lake Forest College vs. Monmouth College

tr.td: Monmouth wins toss, defers, will kickoff and defend South Goal.
Matt Batton kickoff 65 yards to the LFC0, Mike Rantis return 20 yards to the LFC20 (Michael Buehne;Spencer Brown).
